container.heading: Requests for and Inspection of Board Documents

para.text: The public may inspect the rules, decisions, and public records of the Board upon written request filed within a reasonable time period in advance of inspection.
A prescribed format for requests for inspection may not be required.
Written requests shall be submitted to the Board at its official address.
A person may request in writing copies of the Board’s reports, decisions, orders, and certifications.
A request for public records of PERB shall be provided at cost.
